resources.string: "© Copyright 2013 Concur Technologies, Inc.\\nAll rights reserved.\n"
"Book Travel on the go with Concur"
"For help, sign in to the web version of Concur and navigate to Profile > Mobile Registration.\n\nIf your company has issued a company code enter it below."
"You can create or reset your mobile PIN by clicking on \'Need to set your PIN?\' or by navigating to \'Profile -> Mobile Registration\' in Concur online."
"Please contact your company\'s help desk or travel/expense department."
"Your company requires single sign-on (SSO) via a company sign in page. Please select the \'Having Trouble Signing In?\' link at the bottom of this page."
"Your company code cannot be found. Please double-check your value and try again."
"Company sign-on has been disabled for your company. Please contact your company administrator."
"Configuring your mobile session via single sign-on has failed. Please contact your company administrator."
"Please provide a value for company code."
"Your session has expired and auto-sign in is disabled. You must sign in again."

"In most cases, you will sign into our app using the same username and password you use for the web version of Concur.



If you don’t have this information, please submit your email on the previous screen to receive sign in info, or contact your company administrator."

"Based on your company setup, this could either be your Web username or email address. If you don\'t know your username, go to Profile on the Concur Website and use the username displayed under Mobile Registration.\n\nOr go back to the previous screen and submit your Concur registered email. We will send you instructions on how to sign in."

"If your company allows PIN for mobile sign-in:

Go back to the previous screen and submit your Concur registered email. We will send you instructions on how to sign in.



If your company requires a password:

Use the same password you use to sign in to the Concur Website."

"Your PIN is an alternative way to log in and can be created in cases where you are automatically logged into the Web version of Concur by your company and you don\'t know the password.\n\nTo create a PIN, visit the Web version of Concur (Profile > Mobile Registration)."
"Would you like to try again or get sign in help?"
"User Name should consist of your sign in name followed by an @ sign and your company domain."
"Enter your %%0!work email%% to receive your sign in information."
"This is the email you set up in Profile/Personal Information/Email Addresses on the Concur Website."
"Open the email from this device to access the Concur app."
"Please input a valid email address to receive sign-in instructions."
"Set your Mobile PIN to sign in to Concur."
"PIN may be letters, numbers and special characters such as !, $, or # but no spaces"
"The PIN is only for the Concur Mobile app"
"The PINs you entered don\'t match. Please try again."
"PIN may be letters, numbers, and special characters but no spaces."
"Your PIN must be at least %%0!length%% characters."
"Please try again and use link within 24 hours of receipt."
"Your company has disabled Concur for mobile. Please contact your administrator."
"The PIN reset was requested from another device. Please use the same device from which you requested PIN reset."
"We are unable to sign you in at this time. Please contact your company\'s help desk or travel/expense department."
"If your company has issued a company code, enter it here."
"If you don\'t know if you need a company code, check with your company administrator."
"Wrong company code: Please enter your company code."
"The set of custom booking violation reason codes failed to download at this time."
"Your company has disabled air booking on mobile. Please book your flight using the web version of Concur or by calling your Travel Agency."
"Before you can book air travel, you must complete your travel profile. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"For Air travel between these cities, please use the web version of Concur to book your flight."
"Your company booking policy is not currently supported. Custom fields support is coming soon. Please book travel using the web version of Concur."
"Set a PIN by using your Concur web account credentials."

"If you don\'t know your credentials, log into your Concur web account and navigate to Profile > Mobile Registration or to My Account > Mobile PIN. Contact your company administrator for additional help."
"Enter a PIN consisting of at least 4 characters using letters or numbers. Your company may require additional characters."
"See what you can do with Concur"
"Your company has disabled this feature for mobile."
"Concur Mobile can send notifications to your device when items such as approvals or card charges are ready for you. Do you wish to allow these notifications?"
"Search and book flights,\nhotels, car and more"
"If your plans change, cancel and\nrebook another hotel on-the-go"
"• Take pictures of receipts & upload\n• Add expenses with attendees\n• Capture car mileage"
"Depending upon your company configuration, some of the Concur for Mobile features\n\nmay not be available to you"
"New look coming soon for Concur App!\n"

"Your travel profile requires a value for Middle Name, Gender and Date of Birth. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Before you can book air travel, you must complete your travel profile. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Before you can book air travel, you must complete your travel profile. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile has never been saved and must be saved at least one time prior to booking. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel, select Profile and Save.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel configuration billing code/type requires the existence of projects. Please contact your Company Administrator to set up the appropriate projects.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for mobile phone. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Passport Nationality. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Job Title. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Org Unit. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Name-Remark. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.
NOTE: This field may have a customised label. If not found, please contact your Company Administrator.

Please log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Manager. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Employee ID. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a valid email address. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for work address (street, city and country). Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for either a work or home phone number. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\n\nPlease log out, then log back in after providing the above information."
"Really cancel car reservation in %%0!city%% from %%1!pickup date%% to %%2!dropoff date%%?"
"Really cancel hotel reservation in %%0!hotel city%% from %%1!check-in date%% to %%2!check-out date%%?"
"The current itinerary is no longer available."
"Thanks for using Concur! Would you mind taking a moment to rate our application on Google Play?"
"There was an error processing your request. Please try again."
"Please visit the web to provision one or more credit cards for %%0%% use."
"Please contact your company administrator to configure violation reasons for %%0%% use."
"Your company\'s travel policy will not allow this reservation."
"The selected credit card will be charged and the ticket will be issued immediately. The reservation may not be eligible for changes or refunds. Are you sure you want to reserve this flight?"
"When you add a request, you will see it here"
"You can add requests using your Web Concur account"
"An error occurred on your request Recall. Please visit the website for more information."
"An error occurred on your request Submission. Please visit the website for more information."
"An error occurred on your Save operation. Please visit the website for more information."
"Your changes may be lost if you proceed. Would you like to save these changes?"
"Are you sure you want to approve this Request?"
"Would you like to reject this trip?"
"Would you like to approve this trip?"
"Your session has timed-out. Please restart your session from the home screen."
"Error occurred approving Request, please try again."
"Error occurred rejecting Request, please try again."
"The following booking fields have missing or invalid values. Please review and provide the appropriate values."
"An error has occurred retrieving booking information fields. Searches cannot be performed at this time."
"An error has occurred updating booking information fields. Searches cannot be performed at this time."
"What hotel can I find for you?"
"For example, say: \"Find a hotel near the Statue of Liberty for next week.\""
"What flight can I find for you?"
"For example, say: \"Find a first class flight from Seattle to Miami on July 4th.\""
"What rental car can I find for you?"
"For example, say: \"Find an economy car in San Antonio for Thanksgiving weekend.\""
"Are you sure you want to reserve this flight?"
"Search has failed at this time. Please try again at a later time."
"Your company booking policy is not currently supported. Support for it is coming soon. Please book travel using the web version of Concur."
"You have one or more frequent flyer accounts, but did not select one for this booking. Select \'Proceed\' to continue with no account, or \'Cancel\' to select an account."

"Customers holding NON-REFUNDABLE type tickets may cancel their journey, and reuse these tickets to any destination in the carriers system, within one year following the DATE OF ISSUE. Reservations MUST be cancelled by the intended (original) departure day, or tickets will be void and have NO value for future use. These rules apply to DOMESTIC ticketing only. Select these flights anyway?"
"No cars have been found matching the selection criteria. Please choose different criteria and try again."
"+ Add Another Item to this request"
"- Add Another Item to this request"
"No trains have been found matching the selection criteria. Please choose different criteria and try again."
"No hotels have been found matching the selection criteria. Please choose different criteria and try again."
"Searching for flights from %%0%% to %%1%% on %%2%% and returning on %%3%%."
"Searching for rental cars near %%0%% from %%1%% to %%2%%."
"Are you sure you want to approve this claim?"
"The expense claims receipt is unavailable at this time. Please try again later."
"Failed (non-Expense user or no receipt store access, will be removed)"
"Receipt image could not be loaded, but your expense details are saved. Please visit the web if you need to view this receipt image."
"Please touch here to log into Concur Mobile."
"Your selected receipts will be shared to Concur\'s Receipt Store in the background. Please check the notification area on your phones screen for updates."
"You do not have the proper configuration to view/save receipts. Please check with your company administrator."
"Due to being offline, expense type selection data is not available at this time. Please log in again when connected to retrieve the necessary data."
"Uploading of the expense receipt picture has failed at this time. Please try again later, or contact your company administrator if this continues."
"Downloading of the expense receipt picture has failed at this time. Please try again later, or contact your company administrator if this continues."
"Due to being offline, expense type and/or currency selection data is not available at this time."
"The picture was not able to be imported. Please ensure sufficient space (minimum 4MB) is available on the SD card."

"There is no external storage (SD card) available. Please ensure an SD card is inserted and that your phone is not connected via USB to a computer with the SD card available as a directory on your computer."
"This expense has a receipt picture available for download. Select the camera icon below and choose \'Download Picture\' to download and view the receipt."
"This claim may not be submitted at this time as it does not contain expenses. Please add one or more expenses prior to submitting."
"Really add mobile expense entries to a claim?"
"Unable to create request for the server."
"There are no expenses at this time. Please select \"Add New\" below to create one."
"Are you sure you want to submit this expense claim?"

plurals.name: provide_receipt_reminder_line
plurals.item: "You must provide a receipt for the expense listed below."
"You must provide receipts for the expenses listed below."

plurals.name: fax_or_attach_line
plurals.item: "You may either fax the receipt or attach the image."
"You may either fax the receipts or attach the images."

resources.string: "The Concur service is not available at this time to handle this request. Please try again at a later time."
"This claim cannot be submitted. The expense claim contains at least one policy violation. Please access the claim via the web to make the required changes before submitting the claim."

"The expense claim contains one or more expenses with an expense type of Undefined. Select the expense type using Concur web, or via mobile, remove the expense from the claim, select the expense type and add it back to the claim."

"This claim can be submitted but contains at least one expense entry missing a required receipt. Attach a receipt using Concur web, or via mobile, remove the expense from the claim, attach the receipt and add it back to the claim."

plurals.name: report_submit_receipt_required
plurals.item: "According to company policy, you must provide receipts for the expense listed below."
"According to company policy, you must provide receipts for the expenses listed below."

resources.string: "Original paper receipts must be submitted. If you have already provided receipts, you can submit your claim now."
"This expense already has a receipt associated with it. Please select \'Append\' to append this new receipt to this expense, or \'Replace\' to replace the existing receipt with this new receipt."
"We had a problem reading the receipt. Create a manual expense using the receipt."
"The service is unable to complete the operation at this time. Please try again later, or contact your company administrator if this continues."
"Failed to parse the claim form fields. Please try again."
"Really remove \'%%0%%\' incurred on %%1%% for the amount of %%2%%?"
"Unable to Append your receipt. Please try again later"

plurals.name: dlg_expense_remove_confirm_message
plurals.item: "Are you sure you wish to delete the selected expense?"
"Are you sure you wish to delete the selected expenses?"

resources.string: "Removal of this expense is not supported on mobile."

plurals.name: dlg_expense_remove_mixed_confirm
plurals.item:
"Removal of card charges is not supported on mobile. Any selected card charges will not be deleted. 

The selected cash expense will be deleted.

Are you sure?"

"Removal of card charges is not supported on mobile. Any selected card charges will not be deleted. 

The selected cash expenses will be deleted.

Are you sure?"

resources.string: "Are you sure you wish to delete the selected expense(s)? The mobile entry portion(s) of the smart expense(s) will be permanently deleted and the associated card charge(s) will be hidden."
"(Long press on expense for more options.)"
"(Long press on receipt for more options, click for full view.)"
"(Long press on receipt for more options.)"

"Attendee search has failed at this time. Please try again at a later time."
"Search returned no matching attendees. Please try again."

"Swipe right to view advanced search fields."

"The entry must be saved before proceeding.\nWould you like to proceed?"

plurals.name: dlg_expense_invalid_field_values_message
plurals.item: "The following field has an invalid value and must be corrected prior to saving."
"The following fields have invalid values and must be corrected prior to saving."

resources.string: "The following fields have missing values and should be filled in. Skip providing values at this time and proceed?"
"The following fields have missing values and must be filled in prior to saving. Please provide the necessary values and then save."

plurals.name: dlg_expense_copy_down_fields_message_report_header
plurals.item: "You have changed the following field in this claim header. Do you also want to overwrite the same field in all entries and itemisations in this claim with the new value entered here? Click Yes to overwrite the values. Click No to save the changes only in the claim header."

"You have changed the following fields in this claim header. Do you also want to overwrite the same fields in all entries and itemisations in this claim with the new value entered here? Click Yes to overwrite the values. Click No to save the changes only in the claim header."

plurals.name: dlg_expense_copy_down_fields_message_report_entry
plurals.item: "You have changed the following field in this entry. Do you also want to overwrite the same field in all entries and itemisations associated with this entry with the new value entered here? Click Yes to overwrite the values. Click No to save the changes only in the entry."

"You have changed the following fields in this entry. Do you also want to overwrite the same fields in all entries and itemisations associated with this entry with the new value entered here? Click Yes to overwrite the values. Click No to save the changes only in the entry."

"Are you sure you want to reserve this room?\nI understand that my credit card will be charged immediately and no cancellation will be possible later in the booking process. All or portions of the deposit will be forfeited upon cancellation."

"makes it easy to plan your business trips, capture expenses, and get reimbursed."

"and you will receive educational information and news about Concur products and services.



Test Drive Concur now, and see to how simple expense can be."
"Test Drive is a great way to learn more about Concur and how it can help you manage your expense claims."
"To access your Concur account, select Sign In"
"Cut expense claims from hours down to minutes."
"Let\'s get started. We have pre-loaded sample expense claims, card charges and receipts as well as guided overlays to help you on your way."
"Your Test Drive account has expired. If you would like to learn more about Concur, please contact us at\n"
"No need to save all that paper."
"Then submit and get reimbursed. \nManagers can approve from anywhere."

string-array.name: whats_new
string-array.item: "• Improved message to first time user if they login incorrectly"
"• Fix for defaulting currency based on city location"

resources.string: "Open the email from this device to reset your password and sign in."
"There must have been a typo. Please re-enter the password so it matches exactly in both fields."
"Password can contain letters, numbers and special characters, but no spaces."
"The Password reset was requested from another device. Please use the same device from which you requested Password reset."
"Please try again and use link within 24 hours of receipt."
"Your company has disabled Concur for mobile. Please contact your administrator."
"Your Password must be at least %%0!length%% characters."
"Open the email from this device to reset your mobile password (PIN) and sign in."

"Mobile Password (PIN) may be letters, numbers, and special characters but no spaces."
